## [Severability]{.underline}. In the event that any provision of this Agreement is held invalid or unenforceable for any reason by a court of competent jurisdiction, such provision or part thereof shall be considered separate from the remaining provisions of this Agreement, which remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect. Such invalid or unenforceable provision shall be deemed revised to effect, to the fullest extent permitted by law, the intent of the Parties as set forth herein. {#miscellaneous:severability}
